Key Match Events: The Rockets went on a 17-0 run in the middle of the third quarter, turning a nine-point deficit into an eight-point lead that they never relinquished.
Others: The Rockets trailed 65-59 at halftime but outscored Memphis 39-18 in the third quarter to take control of the game.
Ja Morant scored 24 on 8-of-17 shooting to lead Memphis.
Dillon Brooks added 18, Alperen Sengun and Fred VanVleet both had 16, Jabari Smith Jr. had 14 points and 16 rebounds, Tari Eason had 13 and Cam Whitmore had 11.
